approve.description: Allows a spender to withdraw a specified amount of tokens from the caller's account.

transferFrom.description: Transfers tokens from one address to another using the allowance mechanism.

transfer.description: Transfers tokens from the caller's account to the specified address.

burn.description: Burns a specified amount of tokens from the caller's account.

burnFrom.description: Burns a specified amount of tokens from a given account, using the allowance mechanism.

decreaseAllowance.description: Decreases the amount of tokens that a spender is allowed to withdraw from the caller's account.

increaseAllowance.description: Increases the amount of tokens that a spender is allowed to withdraw from the caller's account.

updateBlacklister.description: Updates the address of the blacklister.

unBlacklist.description: Removes an account from the blacklist.

transferOwnership.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new address.

allowance.description: Returns the remaining amount of tokens that the spender is allowed to spend from the owner's account.

balanceOf.description: Returns the balance of tokens held by the specified address.

blacklister.description: Returns the address of the blacklister.

isBlacklisted.description: Checks if the specified account is blacklisted.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimal places used to represent the token.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

owner.description: Returns the current owner of the contract.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of tokens.

Approval.description: Emitted when an owner approves a spender.

Blacklisted.description: Emitted when an account is blacklisted.

BlacklisterChanged.description: Emitted when the blacklister is changed.

OwnershipTransferred.description: Emitted when ownership of the contract is transferred.

Transfer.description: Emitted when tokens are transferred from one address to another.

UnBlacklisted.description: Emitted when an account is removed from the blacklist.

constructor.description: Initializes the contract with an initial supply of tokens.
